member.name: SHSTOCKICONID
member.summary: Used by to identify which stock system icon to retrieve.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_DOCNOASSOC
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_DOCNOASSOC.png".: Document of a type with no associated application.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_DOCASSOC
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_DOCASSOC.png".: Document of a type with an associated application.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_APPLICATION
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_APPLICATION.png".: Generic application with no custom icon.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_SERVER
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_SERVER.png".: A computer on the network.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_PRINTER
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_PRINTER.png".: A local printer or print destination.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_MYNETWORK
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_MYNETWORK.png".: The Network virtual folder (FOLDERID_NetworkFolder/CSIDL_NETWORK).

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_HELP
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_HELP.png".: The Help and Support feature.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_SHARE
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_SHARE.png".: Overlay for a shared item.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_LINK
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_LINK.png".: Overlay for a shortcut.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_SLOWFILE
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_SLOWFILE.png".: Overlay for items that are expected to be slow to access.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_RECYCLERFULL
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_RECYCLERFULL.png".: The Recycle Bin (not empty).

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_AUTOLIST
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_AUTOLIST.png".: A virtual folder that contains the results of a search.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_SERVERSHARE
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_SERVERSHARE.png".: A server shared on a network.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_PRINTERFAX
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_PRINTERFAX.png".: A local fax printer.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_PRINTERFILE
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_PRINTERFILE.png".: A file that receives the output of a Print to file operation.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_STACK
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_STACK.png".: A category that results from a Stack by command to organize the contents of a folder.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_MEDIASVCD
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_MEDIASVCD.png".: Super Video CD (SVCD) media.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_STUFFEDFOLDER
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_STUFFEDFOLDER.png".: A folder that contains only subfolders as child items.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_MEDIACDBURN
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_MEDIACDBURN.png".: A writable CD in the process of being burned.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_MEDIABLANKCD
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_MEDIABLANKCD.png".: Blank writable CD media.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_SHIELD
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_SHIELD.png".: Security shield. Use for UAC prompts only.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_RENAME
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_RENAME.png".: A UI item, such as a button, that issues a rename command.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_DELETE
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_DELETE.png".: A UI item, such as a button, that issues a delete command.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_MEDIAHDDVD
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_MEDIAHDDVD.png".: High definition DVD media in the HD DVD format.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_MEDIABLURAY
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_MEDIABLURAY.png".: High definition DVD media in the Blu-ray Disc™ format.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_USERS
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_USERS.png".: The User Accounts Control Panel item.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_INTERNET
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_INTERNET.png".: The Network and Internet Control Panel item.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_ZIPFILE
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_ZIPFILE.png".: A compressed file with a .zip file name extension.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_SETTINGS
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_SETTINGS.png".: The Additional Options Control Panel item.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_DRIVEHDDVD
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_DRIVEHDDVD.png".:Windows Vista with Service Pack 1 (SP1) and later. High definition DVD drive (any type - HD DVD-ROM, HD DVD-R, HD-DVD-RAM) that uses the HD DVD format.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_DRIVEBD
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_DRIVEBD.png".:Windows Vista with SP1 and later. High definition DVD drive (any type - BD-ROM, BD-R, BD-RE) that uses the Blu-ray Disc format.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_MEDIAHDDVDROM
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_MEDIAHDDVDROM.png".:Windows Vista with SP1 and later. High definition DVD-ROM media in the HD DVD-ROM format.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_MEDIAHDDVDR
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_MEDIAHDDVDR.png".:Windows Vista with SP1 and later. High definition DVD-R media in the HD DVD-R format.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_MEDIAHDDVDRAM
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_MEDIAHDDVDRAM.png".:Windows Vista with SP1 and later. High definition DVD-RAM media in the HD DVD-RAM format.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_MEDIABDROM
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_MEDIABDROM.png".:Windows Vista with SP1 and later. High definition DVD-ROM media in the Blu-ray Disc BD-ROM format.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_MEDIABDR
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_MEDIABDR.png".:Windows Vista with SP1 and later. High definition write-once media in the Blu-ray Disc BD-R format.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_MEDIABDRE
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_MEDIABDRE.png".:Windows Vista with SP1 and later. High definition read/write media in the Blu-ray Disc BD-RE format.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_CLUSTEREDDRIVE
member.summary: .:image type="icon" source="./images/SIID_CLUSTEREDDRIVE.png".:Windows Vista with SP1 and later. A cluster disk array.

member.name: SHSTOCKICONID.SIID_MAX_ICONS
member.summary: The highest valid value in the enumeration. Values over 160 are Windows 7-only icons.
